Posts.Content:
Hi,I am new here.I am scared.Every year I get a mammogram,all normal until this year a week ago.:'( ..I talked with Radiologist he classified my mammo bi-rads 4a.
Even though I talked with him,I am more confused on what this means.I saw mammo he said they meaning 4 white spots are the size of agrain of salt.What does all this mean?
Posts.Title: Biopsy needed
